models.offers: Each offer represents a lead magnet, core product, or expansion opportunity with a structured value proposition. Offers are generated by AI based on pain point analysis and are continuously optimized based on performance data.
models.insights: Institutional learnings that AGRD has discovered from analyzing offer performance across all campaigns. These patterns guide future offer creation and optimization decisions.
models.competitors: Intelligence gathered from competitor offers in the market. Used to identify positioning gaps, pricing benchmarks, and differentiation opportunities.

relationships: Each Offer is linked to a pain point from the Strategy Brain via the painPointId field
Each Offer contains a value stack with core product, bonuses, guarantees, and pricing tiers
Each Offer tracks performance metrics across the full funnel (impressions → clicks → leads → SQLs → customers → revenue)
Insights are generated by analyzing patterns across multiple Offers
Competitor intelligence informs Offer creation by identifying market gaps and positioning opportunities

coreOffer.title: 30-Minute Pipeline Health Assessment
coreOffer.description: We'll analyze your current CRM data and identify exactly where deals are getting stuck, which stages have the longest dwell time, and what conversion rate improvements are immediately available.

bonuses.title: Pipeline Velocity Calculator Spreadsheet
bonuses.description: Pre-built Excel template that calculates your current velocity and projects revenue impact of improvement scenarios

bonuses.title: 10 Pipeline Stage Best Practices Checklist
bonuses.description: Proven criteria for each pipeline stage that top-performing teams use

guarantee.terms: We'll identify at least 3 actionable improvements or we'll send you $100
guarantee.riskReversal: You keep all deliverables even if you request the guarantee

coreOffer.title: Complete Sales System Setup & Training
coreOffer.description: We'll implement a complete sales system including CRM configuration, pipeline design, automation workflows, reporting dashboards, and team training over 6 weeks.

bonuses.title: Custom CRM Setup
bonuses.description: Full implementation in your CRM of choice (HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive) including custom fields, automation, and integrations

bonuses.title: Sales Team Training (3 Sessions)
bonuses.description: Live training for your team on the new system, best practices, and how to maintain pipeline hygiene

bonuses.title: 90-Day Performance Support
bonuses.description: Weekly check-ins and optimization recommendations for the first 90 days post-implementation

bonuses.title: Pipeline Velocity Dashboard
bonuses.description: Custom-built real-time dashboard showing stage velocity, conversion rates, and revenue forecasting

guarantee.riskReversal: You keep all deliverables including CRM setup and training materials

coreOffer.title: 45-Minute Forecasting Accuracy Deep Dive
coreOffer.description: We'll review your current forecasting methodology and identify the top 3 reasons your projections miss targets, plus specific fixes you can implement this quarter.

bonuses.title: Forecasting Accuracy Framework PDF
bonuses.description: Step-by-step guide to building confidence-weighted forecasts that account for pipeline velocity and deal risk

guarantee.terms: If you don't find the session valuable, we'll refund your time by sending you a $50 gift card

coreOffer.title: Premium Analytics & AI-Powered Insights
coreOffer.description: Upgrade to advanced analytics including predictive deal scoring, automated win/loss analysis, and monthly strategy sessions with our data team.

bonuses.title: Monthly Strategy Call
bonuses.description: 30-minute call with our analytics team to review trends and optimize your pipeline based on latest data

bonuses.title: Competitive Intelligence Report
bonuses.description: Quarterly report on how your metrics compare to industry benchmarks

guarantee.terms: Cancel anytime within first 90 days if you don't see measurable improvement in forecast accuracy

coreOffer.title: PMAU Scoring System Implementation Guide
coreOffer.description: Complete framework for qualifying leads using Problem-Money-Authority-Urgency (PMAU) scoring, including scripts, scorecards, and automation templates.

bonuses.title: Lead Qualification Scorecard Template
bonuses.description: Pre-built scorecard with weighted criteria you can customize for your business

bonuses.title: 15 Discovery Question Scripts
bonuses.description: Proven questions that uncover PMAU signals without feeling like an interrogation

bonuses.title: CRM Automation Blueprints
bonuses.description: Step-by-step setup guides for automating lead scoring in HubSpot, Salesforce, and Pipedrive

guarantee.terms: Implement the framework within 30 days or we'll refund double what you paid
guarantee.riskReversal: Keep all templates and scripts regardless

coreOffer.title: 4-Week Cold Outreach Campaign Setup & Execution
coreOffer.description: We'll build and launch a complete cold outreach system including list building, message sequencing, deliverability optimization, and reply handling for your target market.

bonuses.title: Target Account List (500 contacts)
bonuses.description: Hand-verified list of decision-makers at companies matching your ideal customer profile

bonuses.title: Email Deliverability Audit
bonuses.description: Full technical review and optimization of your sending infrastructure (SPF, DKIM, DMARC)

bonuses.title: Reply Handling Playbook
bonuses.description: Scripts and workflows for handling positive replies, objections, and out-of-office scenarios

guarantee.terms: We guarantee 20+ qualified replies or we'll run a second campaign for free
guarantee.riskReversal: You own all lists and sequences even if guarantee is triggered

coreOffer.title: Fractional RevOps Team + Continuous Optimization
coreOffer.description: Get an entire revenue operations function without hiring full-time. Includes system optimization, process documentation, tech stack management, and monthly strategic planning.

bonuses.title: Quarterly Business Reviews
bonuses.description: Executive-level presentation of key metrics, trends, and strategic recommendations

bonuses.title: Unlimited Process Documentation
bonuses.description: We'll document every revenue process in your business using video, written SOPs, and Loom recordings

bonuses.title: Tech Stack Audit + Recommendations
bonuses.description: Complete review of your current tools with cost optimization and integration recommendations

bonuses.title: Priority Support (4-Hour Response)
bonuses.description: Dedicated Slack channel with guaranteed 4-hour response time for urgent issues

guarantee.terms: Cancel after 3 months if you're not satisfied, no questions asked
guarantee.riskReversal: Keep all documentation and tools we've built

coreOffer.title: 2-Week Landing Page & Funnel Optimization
coreOffer.description: Intensive optimization of your highest-traffic pages including heatmap analysis, A/B test setup, copy rewrites, and conversion tracking implementation.

bonuses.title: Heatmap & Session Recording Analysis
bonuses.description: Review of 500+ user sessions to identify friction points and drop-off causes

bonuses.title: 5 A/B Test Variants
bonuses.description: Five different page variations designed and coded for multivariate testing

guarantee.terms: Achieve at least 15% lift in conversion rate within 60 days or we'll refund 50%
guarantee.riskReversal: Keep all page variants and test setups

insights.insight: Offers with outcome-based guarantees convert 34% higher than unconditional money-back guarantees
Lead magnets that promise specific numerical outcomes (e.g., '3 improvements') have 2.1x higher SQL conversion than vague value promises
insights.supportingData: Based on 23 lead magnet offers, 8,450+ leads generated

insights.insight: Expansion offers presented to existing customers within 90 days of onboarding convert 3.8x better than those presented after 6 months
insights.supportingData: Based on 14 expansion offers, 234 existing customers

insights.insight: Offers targeting 'Pipeline Visibility' pain point convert 3.2x better than 'Lead Generation' offers across all channels
insights.supportingData: Based on 52 offers, 15,200+ interactions, consistent across all 4 channels

insights.insight: Value stacks with 3-4 bonuses significantly outperform those with 1-2 or 5+ bonuses (optimal is 3.5 bonuses)

valueStack.coreOffer: Revenue Intelligence Platform with conversation analytics

perceivedStrengths: Strong brand recognition in sales tech space
Advanced AI/ML capabilities for conversation analysis
identifiedGaps: No outcome-based guarantees - only time-limited trial
High price point excludes small businesses
Focused only on post-call analysis, not pre-call preparation

valueStack.coreOffer: Revenue Platform with forecasting and pipeline management

perceivedStrengths: Used by large enterprise customers (high credibility)
identifiedGaps: No clear guarantee or risk reversal
Positioned for enterprise only, excludes mid-market

valueStack.coreOffer: Free ebook: 'Predictable Revenue' by Aaron Ross

perceivedStrengths: Strong thought leadership and brand authority
Clear bridge from free content to paid consulting
identifiedGaps: Book is 10+ years old (methodology may feel dated)
No specific guarantees on consulting outcomes
Consulting pricing is very high (limits accessibility)
